posts.post_content: A nice "surprise! you thought I was tapped out" card for mono-black control, but [Snuff Out](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Snuff Out) is much better. posts.post_content:
There are a lot of really dumb comments on this card. Do the other pacts have this problem?  
  
Basically, this is a [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade) with interest people. That's it. What you make up for in surprise, you pay in mana later, or death if your opponent is clever and wastes your lands. All in all, easily the best pack due to its manageable cost and simple, yet elegant effect, and for the fact that the very pact mechanic is very much black.
posts.html:
There are a lot of really dumb comments on this card. Do the other pacts have this problem?

Basically, this is a Doom Blade with interest people. That's it. What you make up for in surprise, you pay in mana later, or death if your opponent is clever and wastes your lands.
